thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Monica
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Monica

author: Monica
title: Monica
text: I liked my sales gal, and she remembered me when I returned to make my purchase. I didn't like interacting with the *other* sales associates when she wasn't available because I had an established relationship with HER and not with them. (And one of them was unnecessarily sassy with me.) My custom-ordered couch took longer than promised, but I survived. It worked out fine.
